author: markt
msg: Return correct content-length header for HEAD requests when value is > 2GB

author: clement
msg: The INSTANCE_NAME is a static member wrongly protected against concurrent accesses. Another lock (global, shared by all factories) must be used to protect the list from concurrent modification.
I've implemented a fix acquiring the lock on INSTANCE_NAME before each operation. The 'createComponentInstance' has a large part of is code synchronized too.
